channel.title: Santusion
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Santusion[/size][/center]
[size=12pt]So, I have been out of the rsps scene for a while, it's one of those interests that come and go occasionally. But now I am back, and have decided to make this project.
I am trying to make something different in this Rsps wish me luck[/size]
[center][size=14pt]-Current Features-[/size][/center]
[size=14pt]Server Side:[/size]
Nearly perfect combat! Hitmarks with crits etc, Constitution, Real 990! Repacked Server
[size=14pt]Client Side:[/size] 602 Anims and gfx Perfect gameframe still need to add something to it!
[center][size=14pt]-Media-[/size][/center] orbs still needs alot of fixing :P [img]http://puu.sh/1hSEY[/img] Hitmarks i still need to pack the fonts Crits: [img]http://puu.sh/1hSGx[/img] normal: [img]http://puu.sh/1hSHi[/img]
[center][size=14pt]-Updates-[/size][/center] -602 anims and gfx added !
Fixed orbs and packed the fonts and fixed the hp bar [img]http://puu.sh/1hWiv[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1ibIl[/img] Fixed gameframe [img]http://puu.sh/1jIWr[/img]

item.title: Santusion
item.dc:creator: @omarsoliman omarsoliman
item.description:
@omarsoliman wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:4, topic:465046”][quote author=omarsoliman link=topic=569464.msg4130452#msg4130452 date=1351015487]

First picture look’s like a standard PI.

The second picture look’s like Marcbob’s release. MTP world or w.e.

Well yes it is its MTP by Marcbob fixed drops just now xD
[/quote]

First picture isn’t even yours, unless you can prove your Jack from rs[/quote]
Who said its even mine i didnt claim its mine :).

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:465046”]Don’t try fixing the wrong game frame. Just revert to the 317 one, or use a 474 server.[/quote] what do you mean ?

Read full topic
